select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_user set `password` = #{newPassword} where user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: select sum(og.retail_price*og.number) from nideshop_order_goods as og left join nideshop_order as o on og.order_id = o.id where o.pay_status = 2;
select sum(og.number) from nideshop_order_goods as og left join nideshop_order as o on og.order_id = o.id where o.pay_status = 2;

select c2.name ,sum(og.number*og.retail_price) as `price` from nideshop_order as o left join nideshop_order_goods as og on o.id = og.order_id left join nideshop_goods as g on og.goods_id = g.id left join nideshop_category as c on g.category_id = c.id left join nideshop_category as c2 on c.parent_id = c2.id GROUP BY c.name;

select c2.name,sum(og.number) as `number` from nideshop_order as o left join nideshop_order_goods as og on o.id = og.order_id left join nideshop_goods as g on og.goods_id = g.id left join nideshop_category as c on g.category_id = c.id left join nideshop_category as c2 on c.parent_id = c2.id
GROUP BY c.name;
